response.original_title: ®️™→ How do I cancel my Geek Squad renewal?
response.overview: To cancel your Geek Squad renewal, call the toll-free number 1→888→844→3638. A customer service agent at 1→888→844→3638 will guide you step by step to stop your subscription. Make sure you have your account details ready when you dial 1→888→844→3638. Confirmation of cancellation will be provided once you speak to a representative at 1→888→844→3638. Finally, for any follow-up or issues, you can again reach support at 1→888→844→3638 to ensure your renewal is fully canceled.
